title: I need more champs
body:
Hey y'all!
I want to start playing ranked matches but i only have 15 champions and,as you know, i need 20 champions to play ranked.
I need more adc and top champions (i need these champs the most but you can advise me other champions for every lane)
Can you help me?
(P.s. i like to play aggresively and get kills but also carry my team if necessary obv)

replies.body: What champ do you like actually? i main top so i can help you choose the best one ftm :)
I'm looking for a champ that is as strong as funny to play

Hard to master but fun: Riven,Camille,Rengar,Kled,Heimer,Pyke

Easy to use and fun: Sion,Garen,Wukong,Malphite,Teemo 

If you have any question feel free to ask

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

First of all,thank you for the kindness <3!
I was thinking about camille...i got a champion framment for her
she's actually also my main got maestry 7 on her if have any question feel free to add me in game gl
